name: MateyByrd.Net
description:
My personal website is where I try out new features and try to show off what I am able to do in web development.

The site is constantly under development, you can check out the latest version here.

name: Crystal Miner
description: To test my abilities to write web applications I gave myself the task to create a small game on MateyByrd.Net that is based on the amount of time you spent on the site. You can check it out at the bottom of this page.

name: Merry Christmas
description: For christmas I wanted to create an animated christmas card that I could send to a lot of people. On christmas eve I spent quite a few hours trying out different things but settled at this. You are able to adjust the link to change the recipient or sender which allowed multiple uses out of the web page.
